title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default) (see perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

d. Need a width hint for the dialog.

e. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f.
Need to release

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB:
The 'Add' button adds a hidden entry.

Entries already existing in the associated editors are available for selection.
EB:
The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry.

Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

1. Go to the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (Note: No selection should be made), press OK. This adds the selected external editor to the associated editors list.
